products.title: Origin (Blackout), Steel - Vertical Blind
products.description: The smooth neutral of the origin (blackout) steel is a versatile shade of grey-beige that works well with almost any colour it comes across. The quality blackout fabric works well as adjustable louvres, which can be moved according to how much light you want in your room. Complement a rich burgundy for a traditional colour scheme in the lounge or den, or pair with browns and taupes for a cosy, modern feel in the kitchen.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Taupe - Vertical Blind
products.description: A dark taupe in colour, the appropriately named origin (blackout) taupe is a wonderfully tactile, cotton-feel fabric that you'll find you just love to touch. Regardless of its forgiving feel, the high quality fabric is hardwearing and resilient, effortlessly serving its purpose as a proficient blackout blind. For warm, welcoming atmosphere, place the taupe against your kitchen window, surrounded by soft creams and the occasional darker brown.

products.title: Arcadia Steel Vertical Blind
products.description: With a plain grey shade thats at the height of fashion, this understated blind will blend crisply into a modern, minimalist scheme. Want style with practicality? Got you covered - the rigid pvc slats are so easy to care for, so spills and marks can be wiped away effortlessl with a plain grey shade thats at the height of fashion, this understated blind will blend crisply into a modern, minimalist scheme.

products.title: Arcadia Sedate Grey Vertical Blind
products.description: Truly sedate and stylish, this lightly coloured, smoothly textured grey vertical blind will hang with perfect minimalism at your window. The vanes are rigid so require no bottom weights or chains, great for creating a modern streamlined look. Waterproof and blackout, this bli truly sedate and stylish, this lightly coloured, smoothly textured grey vertical blind will hang with perfect minimalism at your window.

products.title: Serino Blackout Carbon Rigid Pvc 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Serino blackout is made from rigid pvc and is perfect for bathrooms and commercial environments at a very affordable price. This grey vertical blind is made from rigid pvc slats that require no weights or chains, the perfect choice for bathrooms or commercial environments. Product id: db-dvtb1126 fabric colour: carbon material: fiberglass core laminated with pvc layered coating headrail: metal headrail slat width: 89mm control type: wand and cord energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes serino blackout carbon rigid pvc 89mm vertical blind in grey.

products.title: Anthology, Moonstone - Vertical Blind
products.description: The purposeful style of the anthology in moonstone provides the best of both worlds with its gorgeous, woven texture and natural beige hue. The light, supple fabric is of the highest quality, and hangs in neat louvres for easy workability. The traditional room for such a natural material might be the kitchen, where it will undeniably look fantastic amongst hessian fabrics and woven wicker, but why not couple the moonstone with deep chocolate browns in a country living room instead? With this versatile fabric, you'll never run out of options.
